analysis.description:
TokenERC20 (/unique_contracts/0x2d1fbbd6f82738ca00b09024a81e12a8816a22bc.sol#22-178) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_contracts/0x2d1fbbd6f82738ca00b09024a81e12a8816a22bc.sol#86-92)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x2d1fbbd6f82738ca00b09024a81e12a8816a22bc.sol:
	Contract C3_TokenCreate has payable functions:
	 - buy (/unique_contracts/0x2d1fbbd6f82738ca00b09024a81e12a8816a22bc.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
TokenERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x2d1fbbd6f82738ca00b09024a81e12a8816a22bc.sol#26-27)
owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x2d1fbbd6f82738ca00b09024a81e12a8816a22bc.sol#15-20) should be declared external
